title: Do Christian Israelites slow down to help in the form of Rambe?
subtitle: United States The postal service workers throughout the country reported a backlog of letters and packages in the summer of 2020. But was the issue political?
author: Jessica Lee
vclaim: United States General Louis DeJoy, a political ally of United States President Donald Trump, ordered postal service carriers to "cut the mail" to help Trump win the 2020 presidential election.
